text: Üsküdar University is a university in Istanbul, Turkey. It was founded by the Human Values and Mental Health Foundation. It is the first university of Turkey for the study of Behavioral Health and Sciences. The university consist of four undergraduate faculties, one Vocational School Of Health Services, and one institute. ==Faculty & Institute== *Communication Faculty *Faculty of Health Sciences *Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences http://mdbf.uskudar.edu.tr/en/en *Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences http://itbf.uskudar.edu.tr/en/en *VOCATIONAL SCHOOL OF HEALTH SERVICES *Institutes ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Istanbul Category:2011 establishments in Asia Category:2010s establishments in Turkey
title: Uskudar University
